invention-title: Membrane separation and condensation combined hydrogen/carbon dioxide separation process and system
一种膜分离与冷凝结合的氢气/二氧化碳分离工艺及系统

abstract.p: A membrane separation and condensation combined hydrogen/carbon dioxide separation process and system belong to the technical field of coal gasification synthesis gas separation and purification, the system mainly comprises a condensation separation process and a membrane separation process, and specifically comprises a compressor, a condenser, a separator, a vacuum pump, an expansion machine, a membrane separation unit using a carbon dioxide selective membrane and other equipment. The process is based on a separation system: a synthesis gas raw material and recycle gas are mixed and then enter a condenser, most of carbon dioxide is condensed into a liquid state by utilizing the difference of boiling points of hydrogen and carbon dioxide, and the liquid state is separated by a separator and then is output as a carbon dioxide product; non-condensable gas obtained by the separator is sent into a two-stage membrane separation system for purification, permeated gas of a two-stage membrane separation unit is used as recycle gas, and retentate gas is output as a hydrogen product. The advantages of a condensation separation method and a membrane separation method are combined, carbon dioxide and hydrogen products with high purity and recovery rate can be obtained at the same time, and the separation performance is excellent; in addition, the carbon capture energy consumption as low as 0.68 GJ/t can be realized, which is far lower than that of the traditional synthesis gas separation technology.

一种膜分离与冷凝结合的氢气/二氧化碳分离工艺及系统，属于煤气化合成气分离提纯技术领域，系统主要包括冷凝分离过程和膜分离过程，具体包括压缩机、冷凝器、分离器、真空泵、膨胀机和使用二氧化碳选择性膜的膜分离单元等设备。工艺基于分离系统实：合成气原料与循环气混合后先进入冷凝器，利用氢气和二氧化碳沸点的差异，将其中大部分二氧化碳冷凝为液态，并通过分离器分离后作为二氧化碳产品输出；而由分离器所得的不凝气将被送入两级膜分离系统提纯，其中二级膜分离单元的渗透气将被作为循环气，渗余气则作为氢气产品输出。本发明结合了冷凝分离法和膜分离法的优势，能够同时获得纯度和回收率较高的二氧化碳和氢气产品，分离性能优越；此外，还可实现低至0.68GJ/t的碳捕集能耗，远低于传统的合成气分离技术。
